Waste Sorting Guide

Trash

Items that cannot be recycled or composted go here.

  • Plastic bags
  • Styrofoam
  • Non-recyclable plastics

Recycling

Clean and dry items that can be processed into new materials.

  • Paper and cardboard
  • Glass bottles and jars
  • Metal cans

Composting

Organic materials that can break down into nutrient-rich soil.

  • Food scraps
  • Yard waste
  • Paper towels
